original_text: This prayer may be the words of the people or the words of Jeremiah. ‘ Lord, have you completely turned away from the people of Judah? Do you really hate the people of Zion? You have knocked us down so that we will never get better. We hoped to live in peace, but nothing good happened to us. We hoped to have rest from our troubles, but instead we live in fear. This prayer may be the words of the people or the words of Jeremiah. ‘ Lord, have you completely turned away from the people of Judah? Do you really hate the people of Zion? You have knocked us down so that we will never get better. We hoped to live in peace, but nothing good happened to us. We hoped to have rest from our troubles, but instead we live in fear. ‘ Lord, have you completely turned away from the people of Judah?
korean_text: 주께서 유다를 온전히 버리시나이까 주의 심령이 시온을 싫어하시나이까 어찌하여 우리를 치시고 치료하지 아니하시나이까 우리가 평강을 바라도 좋은 것이 없고 치료 받기를 기다리나 두려움만 보나이다

sentences.original_text: This prayer may be the words of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 이 기도는 백성의 말일 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Lord, have you completely turned away
Do you really hate the people of Zion?
so that we will never get better.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 우리는 결코 회복하지 못할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: We hoped to live in peace,
but nothing good happened to us.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리에게 좋은 일은 일어나지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: We hoped to have rest from our troubles,
but instead we live in fear.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 대신 두려움 속에 살고 있습니다
